qas.question: Who establishd the inviolability of nobles property?
When did the established right for inviolability of nobles property?
What happened to the right to mint coinage?

context: In <a1_0>1422<a1_0/> <a0_0>King Władysław II Jagiełło<a0_0/> by the Privilege of Czerwińsk (Polish: "przywilej czerwiński") established the inviolability of nobles' property (their estates could not be confiscated except upon a court verdict) and <a2_0>ceded<a2_0/> some jurisdiction over fiscal policy to the Royal Council (later, the Senat of Poland), including the right to mint coinage.
